statements: SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT full_name, age FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE platform = 'LinkedIn';
SELECT full_name, email FROM candidate_profiles ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT id, full_name, email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE platform = 'LinkedIn' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE platform = 'GitHub' AND age < 30 ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT id, full_name, platform FROM candidate_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@domain.com' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, platform_username FROM platform_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT id, name, age, bio FROM candidate_profiles WHERE age < 25;
SELECT platform_id, platform_name, platform_username FROM platform_profiles WHERE platform_id = 5;
SELECT name, age FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT platform_name, platform_username FROM platform_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 2;
SELECT name, bio FROM candidate_profiles WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT platform_name, platform_id FROM platform_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 3 ORDER BY platform_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT full_name, birthdate FROM candidate_profiles WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM candidate_profiles ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT education_background, work_experience_years FROM biographical_information WHERE work_experience_years > 5;
SELECT platform_name, username, followers_count FROM platforms WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM candidate_profiles WHERE birthdate > '1990-01-01';

SELECT cp.full_name, bi.current_company, plat.username FROM candidate_profiles cp INNER JOIN biographical_information bi ON cp.id = bi.candidate_id INNER JOIN platforms plat ON cp.id = plat.candidate_id WHERE bi.work_experience_years > 5;

SELECT cp.full_name, bi.education_background, plat.platform_name FROM candidate_profiles cp INNER JOIN biographical_information bi ON cp.id = bi.candidate_id INNER JOIN platforms plat ON cp.id = plat.candidate_id WHERE bi.work_experience_years < 3;

SELECT cp.full_name, bi.work_experience_years, plat.followers_count FROM candidate_profiles cp INNER JOIN biographical_information bi ON cp.id = bi.candidate_id INNER JOIN platforms plat ON cp.id = plat.candidate_id WHERE plat.followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY bi.work_experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT * FROM biographical_info WHERE nationality = 'USA';
SELECT candidate_id, skill_name, proficiency_level FROM skills ORDER BY proficiency_level DESC, skill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profiles WHERE candidate_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM candidate_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM candidate_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM biographical_info WHERE nationality = 'USA' AND (gender = 'Female' OR date_of_birth > '1990-01-01');
SELECT platform_name, followers_count FROM platforms WHERE account_id LIKE '%twitter%' ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profile;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM candidate_profile WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT institution, degree, graduation_year FROM educational_background ORDER BY graduation_year DESC;
SELECT company_name, role, start_date, end_date FROM work_experience WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT skill_name, proficiency FROM skills WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY skill_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM candidate_profile;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM candidate_profile ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM candidate_profile WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, company_name, role FROM candidate_profile JOIN work_experience ON candidate_profile.candidate_id = work_experience.candidate_id;
SELECT full_name, skill_name, proficiency FROM candidate_profile JOIN skills ON candidate_profile.candidate_id = skills.candidate_id WHERE skills.proficiency = 'Advanced';
